casebody.data:
GERALD W.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. January 11, 2017

James E. Mortimer, in support of the petition.

Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Gerald W.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 456, 150 A.3d 729 (2016), is denied.
